front.title: IANA Reserved IPv4 Prefix for Shared CGN Space

abstract.t: This document requests the allocation of an IPv4 /10 address block to be used as Shared Carrier Grade Network Address Translation (CGN) Space. Service Providers will use Shared CGN Space to number the interfaces that connect CGN devices to Customer Premise Equipment (CPE). As this document proposes the allocation of an additional special-use IPv4 address block, it updates RFC 5735.
